videoSnippet.title: Nepo: A Sad End to a Sad Tournament.
videoSnippet.description:
Full interview with Hans here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CJZuT-_kij0

Photos by Lennart Ootes
Have a great day :)

Firouzja, Alireza (2778) - Nepomniachtchi, Ian (2792) 
Sinquefield Cup (chess24.com) [12] 2022.09.12
A15 English, 1...Nf6 (Anglo-Indian defense)

1.c4 Nf6 2.g3 e5 3.Bg2 c6 4.Nf3 e4 5.Nd4 d5 6.cxd5 Qxd5 7.e3 Na6 8.d3 Bb4+ 9.Nc3 Bxc3+ 10.bxc3 Nc5 11.c4 Qe5 12.dxe4 Ncxe4 13.O-O c5 14.Nb3 O-O 15.f3 Nd6 16.e4 Qe7 17.e5 Nxc4 18.exf6 Qxf6 19.Qd5 Be6 20.Qxc5 h6 21.f4 Rad8 22.f5 b6 23.Qc7 Rc8 24.Qf4 Bd7 25.Qd4 Qxd4+ 26.Nxd4 Rfd8 27.Bf4 Ba4 28.Nf3 Bc2 29.g4 Nb2 30.Ne5 Ba4 31.Rac1 Rxc1 32.Rxc1 f6 33.Ng6 Nd3 34.Rc7

00:00 Hello Everyone!
00:17 Nepo vs Hans!
01:52 Game Starts
02:50 Completely New Game!
03:57 Pause the Video!
06:24 It Was in This Position
07:05 STANDINGS FINAL ROUND! 
08:31 Contributions!

The Sinquefield Cup is a 10-player classical round-robin taking place in the Saint Louis Chess Club from 2-11 September 2022. It's the fifth and final stage of the 2022 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.4 million.

The players receive 90 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 30 minutes to the end of the game, plus a 30-second increment starting from move one. Official website: grandchesstour.org
